data.title: Twenty One Capital To Become Largest NYSE-Listed Bitcoin Treasury Company—Second Only to Strategy Overall
data.description: Shareholders have approved a merger between Twenty One Capital and Cantor Equity Partners. The combined entity will start trading on the New York Stock Exchange ...
data.keywords: New York Stock Exchange, Twenty One Capital, Cantor Equity Partners, Bitcoin mining, Cantor Fitzgerald, One Capital, Private Investment in Public Equity
